flavor: "Why don't you pick on somebody your own size?"
name: Ant-Man
text: Puny Pest - Response: After you change to this form, remove 1 threat from a scheme.

flavor: "Being Cassie's hero is all I've ever wanted."
name: Scott Lang
text: Time to Unwind - Response: After you change to this form, heal 1 damage from Scott Lang.

flavor: "Oh Yeah, tiny dude is big now!"
name: Ant-Man
text: Giant Nuisance - Response: After you change to this form, deal 1 damage to an enemy.

name: Wasp
text: Hero Response: After Wasp enters play, deal 2 damage to an enemy if you are in [[Giant]] hero form or remove 2 threat from a scheme if you are in [[Tiny]] hero form.

flavor: "I'd run if I were you." - Scott Lang
name: Giant Stomp
text: Play only if you are in [[Giant]] hero form. Hero Action (attack): Deal 1 damage to each minion. Deal 8 damage to an enemy.

name: Hive Mind
text: Play only if you are in [[Tiny]] hero form. Hero Action (thwart): Remove 2 threat from a scheme. Remove 1 additional threat from that scheme for each Army of Ants support you control.

name: Resize
text: Hero Action: Change to your other hero form. Draw 1 card.

name: Pym Particles
text: Hero Response: After you spend this card, heal 2 damage from your hero if you are in [[Giant]] hero form or draw 1 card if you are in [[Tiny]] hero form.

name: Army of Ants
text: Hero Action: If you are in [[Tiny]] hero form, exhaust Army of Ants → deal 1 damage to an enemy.

name: Ant-Man's Helmet
text: Hero Response: After you change to [[Giant]] hero form, heal 2 damage from your hero. Hero Response: After you change to [[Tiny]] hero form, draw 1 card.

flavor: "My daughter lost her phone. I thought I'd look under these buildings." - Scott Lang
name: Giant Strength
text: Hero Response: After you change to [[Giant]] hero form, you get +1 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Wrist Gauntlets
text: Hero Action: If you are in [[Giant]] hero form, exhaust Wrist Gauntlets and spend [physical][physical] resources → stun an enemy. Hero Action: If you are in [[Tiny]] hero form, exhaust Wrist Gauntlets and spend [energy][energy] resources → confuse an enemy.

name: Ant-Man
text: Ant-Man gets +1 hit point for each pym counter on him. Interrupt: When Ant-Man enters play, place 1 pym counter on him (to a maximum of 4) for each resource you overpaid for Ant-Man's cost.

flavor: "Size isn't everything. Unless you're stepping over a bridge."
name: Giant-Man
text: Giant-Man gets +2 ATK while he has 3 or more remaining hit points.

flavor: "Dunno who's wearing the suit this time, but they can definitely handle themself in a fight." - Spectrum
name: Ronin
text: Ronin gets +1 THW and +1 ATK while an upgrade is attached to them.

name: Stinger
text:
Play only if your identity has the [[Avenger]] trait.
Stinger does not count against your ally limit.

name: Call for Aid
text: Hero Action: Discard cards from the top of your deck until you discard an [[Avenger]] ally, then add that ally to your hand.

flavor: "If you mess with one of us, you mess with all of us!" Even if I'm the last one." - Nova
name: Moxie
text: Hero Response: After you change form, your hero gets +1 THW, +1 ATK, +1 DEF until the end of the round.

name: Power Gloves
text: Attach to an [[Avenger]] ally. Max 1 per ally. Response: After attached ally attacks or thwarts, deal 1 damage to an enemy.

flavor: "Remember, it's not just the suit that gives you power, it's how you use it." - Hank Pym
name: Reinforced Suit
text:
Attach to an ally. Max 1 per ally.
Attached ally gets +2 hit points.

name: Swarm Tactics
text: Team-up (Ant-Man and Wasp). Max 1 per deck. Hero Action: Change to your other hero form. Ready your hero.

name: Team-Building Exercise
text: Hero Action: Exhaust Team-Building Exercise → play a card from your hand that shares a trait with your hero, reducing its resource cost by 1.

name: Moment of Triumph
text: Hero Response: After you attack and defeat an enemy, heal 1 damage from your hero for each point of excess damage dealt to that enemy by that attack.

flavor: "Maybe this will teach you!" - Captain America
name: Lay Down the Law
text: Hero Response (thwart): After you change form, remove 3 threat from a scheme (4 threat instead if you paid for this card using a [mental] resource).

name: Muster Courage
text: Play only if your identity has the [[Avenger]] trait. Hero Action: Give up to X friendly characters a tough status card (to a maximum of 3 characters), where X is equal to the villain's stage number.

flavor: "Well, if I run, that's not cool. And if I stay and get tasered, that's not cool either. I'm in a bit of a pickle." - Tony Stark
name: Assess the Situation
text: Action: You get +1 hand size until the end of the phase.
